    ebookRead::getContentFile
    


    
getContentFile(
string
$location );

    

	

		
    Parameters
    
			
    $location
    
		
    Where file is located inside of the content area.
    
			
    Returns
    
		
    The contents of the requested file.
    

    Remarks
    

    Will give you the requested file out of the epub  Note: When finding files based on the manifest's href attribute, the file locations are  relative to where the opf file is located in the file structure.
